Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Quickly \Quick"ly\, adv. Speedily; with haste or celerity; soon; without delay; quick. [1913 Webster]

quickly adv 1: with rapid movements; "he works quickly" [syn: {rapidly}, {speedily}, {chop-chop}, {apace}] [ant: {slowly}] 2: with little or no delay; "the rescue squad arrived promptly"; "come here, quick!" [syn: {promptly}, {quick}] 3: without taking pains; "he looked cursorily through the magazine" [syn: {cursorily}]
